sentences.english: Sauna center on the basement floor, beauty center.
sentences.chinese: 位於酒店地下一層的洗浴中心，美容美髮中心。

sentences.english: The researchers found that higher scores on a measure of chronic loneliness were associated with an increase in warmer baths or showers.
sentences.chinese: 研究者發現較高分的慢性寂寞和溫度較高的洗浴有關。

sentences.english: Oily skin after bathing, every mind and the body fluent in its landscaping.
sentences.chinese: 洗浴後皮膚油膩，渾身舒暢，氣血通順，心曠神怡。

sentences.english: Sanmen Gorge washes taking bath which finishes having the massage place?
sentences.chinese: 三門峽洗哪有好的洗浴按摩的地方？

sentences.english: The washing-room is between two bedrooms.
sentences.chinese: 洗浴間在兩個臥室之間。

sentences.english: Third, deep sea hot spring bath center.
sentences.chinese: 三是深海溫泉洗浴中心。

sentences.english: Her duties included housecleaning , administering medicine, assisting her to take a bath.
sentences.chinese: 她的責任包括清潔，鍡藥，協助她洗浴。

sentences.english: The school also provided sleeping mats, coverlets, bath facilities and hot tea.
sentences.chinese: 學校給這些家長提供墊絮，牀單，洗浴設施及熱茶。

sentences.english: When washing bath, make the whole body grind with thick bath salt first arenaceous , disinfect clean body.
sentences.chinese: 洗浴時，先用粗浴鹽作全身磨砂，消毒淨身。

sentences.english: Washing bath area, we choose the vitreous mosaic that is close to with wall paint color.
sentences.chinese: 在洗浴區，我們選用與牆漆顏色接近的玻璃馬賽克。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a bathing device heating water by micro-wave un-interruption.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種以微波不間斷加熱水的洗浴器。

sentences.english: Even some residential appearance is almost the same with the bath.
sentences.chinese: 甚至有的住宅外觀同洗浴中心相差無幾。

sentences.english: The bathrooms have walk-in showers, hairdryers and toiletries.
sentences.chinese: 每間現代浴室內都提供洗浴用品和吹風機。

sentences.english: You have a collection of minature shampoo bottles that you take every time you stay in a hotel.
sentences.chinese: 在離開旅館時，你會把沒用完的小袋洗浴膏帶走。

sentences.english: This is also the case when it comes to making purchases of products, including bathing supplies, for your baby.
sentences.chinese: 在給寶寶買洗浴用品時也可以這樣。

sentences.english: Finally, you need to be very cautious about the particular bathing products that you utilize for your child.
sentences.chinese: 最後，用特殊的洗浴產品給孩子洗澡時要格外謹慎。

definition: to bathe/to immerse oneself in a warm bath
to take a bath/to bathe/to immerse
to soak in a spa or hot spring
